website_summaries.verdict: Functional and durable black unisex apron with many features reflecting thoughtful design.
pros: Professional-grade quality apron built with solid brass rivets and grommets
Double-stitched pockets designed for high functionality and durability
Made from 10 oz cotton to be breathable and very durable
Multiple uses – kitchen, art, gardening, grilling, tending bar
Unique headphone loop for music or books while working
cons: Somewhat pricey, but most purchasers are happy with this apron

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected! I am a sneaker customizer and I tend to get a bit messy when painting. I can’t tell you how much money I’ve wasted on ruining clothes. This apron is exactly what I was looking for. Great quality denim, great craftsmanship, great stitching. It’s a bit stiff, but with a little wear it will break right in. As an artist, I had to make this apron 1 of a kind. So I added my own touch, but this doesn’t take away from the quality of this apron. I’m sure once my customers see this I’ll be buying plenty more!! Thanks!! -Clr Blnd Design
customer_reviews.author: Clr Blnd Design

customer_reviews.title: I love my apron!
customer_reviews.text: I love my apron! I’m a hairdresser and was looking for something with a bit more character than the normal black ones. I love that it’s a racer back design which keeps the strap off the neck and is way more comfortable. It wasn’t too stiff straight out of the box, but one of the pockets, on the inside came unsewn after the first washing. It only affects the functionality of one pocket. Not a huge deal, just slightly annoying. *Edited* customer service is stellar. They asked for feedback about their product. I said how much I love my apron but also about the pocket. They’re sending a new one. Not necessary, but greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well built product it fits perfect it's adjustable doesn't ride up in you lots of pockets and no bowtie in the back. It has a buckle that clips together with adjustment. Well thought out when making this..
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Edlund

customer_reviews.title: A great company with a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these aprons! Every year or so I look for aprons as Xmas presents for my sons and their wives. I have never found any I am crazy about until I found these aprons. They are so perfect. Adjustable so they fit anyone...so well made and besides that, they are so cool looking! I am so pleased with them that I will look to see what else I can buy from these wonderful folks. They are real folks and when I had a problem they were right there! Not robots for sure...this company is first class all the way...
customer_reviews.author: Diane Alesch Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quality apron good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice apron,good price fits beautifuly,this is the most I spent on a apron and it was worth it looks classy with a lot of pockets.fits even very skinny people.ill add on pics to show snap on back of apron
customer_reviews.author: #1 patriots fan

customer_reviews.title: Not for Work
customer_reviews.text: This is a modeling apron at best, regardless what any other review says, this is NOT a kitchen apron! Durability is a ZERO, it started coming apart after first wash and after second wash it's no longer wearable. The issue is the straps, which can not be disconnected from the apron, the metal rings have come out of the apron after 2 uses. All positive reviews of this apron are a misleading fabrication. To confirm, simply read the other 1 start reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and highly functional.
customer_reviews.text: This chef’s apron was a real surprise. I ordered it, but I had no ides i was getting such a size flexible , high quality really great looking and highly functional apron. Over the head and click is how long it takes to put on. No tying , Fit it once and click it on. From the functional metal rings to the leather and black color , this is a fine looking piece of cooking gear. I love wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Quality as a great price
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few weeks to review this as I wanted to put it through a few uses and washes. I am impressed both with the quality and the value of this apron. The back straps are far more comfortable than the neck strap type - especially if it is worn for an extended period of time. The pockets are what really sold me however. They hold everything I need whether grilling, deep frying or smoking. I have no doubt you will love this as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband's birthday, he is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday, he is new to grilling and I am encouraging his new talents. He loves this apron! He loves all the pockets and loops and how it fits. My husbnad is an XL tshirt guy, and this is adjustable and fit his broad shoulders perfectly! Now he is even more excited to grill! Hooray for me and all the yummy food!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: PROS: • Very comfortable to wear / easy to adjust • Plenty of pocket storage • Wicks moisture away from the body CONS: • Attracts lint while in the dryer • The towel loop is a bit low for me @ 5'10" I wear this all week and machine wash it every weekend. It's been great to work in.... extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Bumstead

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for husky person
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. Stiching is great. Not too big on the clip since it kept sliding off when trying to put it on. Eventually gave up. This apron is not meant for a husky guy like me. Would have given it 5 stars, but I cant use it. I'll probably give it away to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Apron, quality material, horrible stitching
customer_reviews.text: Looks great out of the box. Heavy duty material nice pockets. the pen pocket ripped up the first day after rolling my chest around some tubing, no sharp edges, nothing snagged, just a little pressure under the corner. It kept getting bigger so I pulled very gently to see how strong the stitching was, and it was a joke how easily it ripped off. A few days later the other pockets started to rip at the stitching, after a couple weeks of use all pockets are gone, other than that good material
customer_reviews.author: Rodger M

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my SO and they love it. It's high quality fabric that cleans easily in the washing machine. We have yet to make use of the little headphones strap since we both cook with music over speakers rather than headphones, but all the other pockets and straps are great it's super nice to be able to carry a towel around. It's nicely water resistant which is good if you have a splashy sink. It's wide enough and long enough as well that it covers most of your body from any food prep mess and is still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Apron for the MAN AT HOME
customer_reviews.text: Its not looking "traditional", but this is actually a plus - it has this tongue-in-cheek pretentious seriousness, that makes housework fun ;) Fits well, quality of denim is fine, quality of stitches is fine, plastic buckles lock/unlock as expected, no smells. I had not yet washed the apron - so don't know how well will the straps will handle being laundered.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine V.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Am a bit crazy (ocd) with washing dishes and cooking mess/splashes on my clothing So I got that apron and am very pleased with it durable, quality and all the pockets are great wife laughed then she loved it and I think she is about to use it... am telling you
customer_reviews.author: can.i.tell.you.something

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Stylish at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron for my friend and I for putting on a bar event with a large group of friends. The fit is really good and adjustable, and the denim is soft and comfortable. It looks really sharp, and the design of the pockets are good too. I wish the denim were just a bit thicker, but I again think that wouldn't matter unless you are doing more serious construction or renovation work. For anything in the kitchen or behind the bar, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship and material quality
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect it to be such top quality. It would be impossible to find anything to complain about. I intend to buy another one soon. It puts all the rest of my aprons to shame. Because of its unique design, I believe it would fit almost anyone. The bib gives great coverage, the width is ample, and it is long enough to protect my clothing. Even though I purchased it for functionality, it is just a very attractive product. Thanks to your entire family. I wish you great success!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gale

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and appears very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the apron only a few weeks. It appears to be very durable. Lots of pockets, which is nice, and easy to put on and take off. I'm very pleased with the product. However, the instructions state that you should not wash nor dry clean the apron, only wipe off with a damp cloth. Haven't gotten to the point where the apron really needs cleaning, so not sure how this will work. Regardless, still very pleased.l
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute apron. The denim is sturdy and it doesn’t shrink in the wash. It fits great. Only one problem - it STINKS. I’ve washed it 4 times, hot water, extra soap, vinegar... it still smells. I’m hoping that if I keep washing, maybe soak it overnight in vinegar/water/soap, the smell will fade enough so I can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: A great apron perfectly suited for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great apron made of a robust denim fabric. I use it three days per week in my volunteer role at a local ministry to the homeless in Greensboro, NC. The multiple pockets come in very handy carrying the various condiment packets, napkins and additional plastic “sporks”.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great Apron for the money
customer_reviews.text: This apron is a great product for the price point. The material is very sturdy and can take a bit of a beating. It is a little stiff when you first get it, however after a few uses and washes it loosens right up. Multiple pockets make it easy to keep your utensils/tools where you can easily get to them. It did take me a minute to figure out how to correctly get it on and off but once that was figured out I really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent apron
customer_reviews.text: As a ceramics student I love to use this apron when working on my various projects. All the pockets are in just the right places and it holds everything you could possibly need
customer_reviews.author: Coop Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome apron!
customer_reviews.text: This apron is really cool. It fits well and has the clasps on the back which are very easy to use. Washes without tearing or anything falling off. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Castille Creations

customer_reviews.title: Almost a steal
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very comfortable. I've worn it for hours while working on various baking or cooking projects to keep myself clean. It's easily adjustable, fits well, and has enough pockets for everything you could possibly need while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Uhlrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance who is an artist. He loves it! The material is really nice and durable, lots of pockets. It's long enough to cover his thighs, which is great because he's 6'1". Easy on/off with the clip on the back. It's very professional looking. Love it! Will be buying more on the future.
customer_reviews.author: S R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hipster Apron...
customer_reviews.text: Love this apron. Now when cooking and grilling with guests over, I don't look like such a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sidbo

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually an apron kind of guy but some cooking and grilling jobs call for it. The apron fits nicely and has pockets and holders, which is great because I have a place for everything. I also like that it comes up high on the chest and protected my clothing from splatters.
customer_reviews.author: m erenthal

customer_reviews.title: Best Apron Ever! Wide!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic apron! I’m a wide shoulder/chest guy, so most aprons are too small. This one fits great! The only issue I’ve had is that the hanger loop broke off the second time I tried to hang it. I can easily sew it back on, so no biggie. Heavy material, seems super durable. I’ve worked on restaurants for over a decade, and this is by far the best apron I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Creekmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apron for Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this apron a few days ago. I have used it every night when I cook dinner. I absolutely love it! It's perfect. Loving the deep blue color, the straps are perfectly adjustable and the compartments are really handy. I hope I can have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with plenty of room for adjustments. Material is good and the length allows plenty of protection with nice placement of pockets. The shoulder pads add extra comfort and will be nice if some weighted items are placed in apron. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesma

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great apron! Was deabating if I should buy it but I’m glad I did! Well made. Sturdy and versatile! Got as a gift for my teenage son. He loves the fact that it has those sturdy pockets to keep all tools handy. Might have to get another one for myself in the kitchen. Works great in the kitchen too!
customer_reviews.author: T Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Just received it but so far so good. It's considerably more comfortable that those that hang on your neck. Has good coverage (lengnth and breadth) and I'm not a small person. Pockets should come in handy but it's going to take a while to get used to them. Overall, nice apron at a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbo

customer_reviews.title: Best apron ever!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best aprons I have ever had!! With the center piece in the back holding the straps you don’t have the problem with it riding up you neck and having to constantly fix it. Great material and thickness, note cheap paper thin material like most aprons. Plenty of pocket space and cooking utensil holder. Also great customer service from Evy the owner and maker of the apron! She reached out through email and gave some info on the apron!!
customer_reviews.author: S Rod

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice, fake leather though
customer_reviews.text: The leather isn't leather it's pleather at best but my husband really likes this apron. He hasn't worn it much only a handful of times so how it's wears is yet to be determined. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: 311CHICK

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality and fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it at first, but after only a week of being in use its falling apart. The seems are coming undone and the actual fabric is tearing. I wish I didn't go a few months without using it so I could have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: c.jayce

customer_reviews.title: can be a perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a nice fitted dress shirt. Would like to see thicker ,richer and more vibrant pieces of leather in place of thin pale pieces. it would add much more class to it. But that just personal preference. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I first looked at the apron that it was way too big but after adjusting it fit like a glove. Good quality apron, perfect for using in my small wood shop.
customer_reviews.author: Steel414

customer_reviews.title: I love my apron
customer_reviews.text: I love my apron! The graphics r excellent and it just has a really cool creep factor. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because I'm not a huge fan of the material, it's very thin and stains easily. Also, I am super short so in order to make it fit right, I have to fold it over itself and tie it in the front so that it doesn't hang to my toes, and that of course covers up the picture. I know aprons r typically one size fits all, but it would be cool if u could do a shorter version.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah weikum

customer_reviews.title: Weight rests on the shoulders not the neck.
customer_reviews.text: The way this apron adjusts allows for a nice secure fit without it feeling too snug or sloppy and loose. My favorite part about this apron is that the weight rests on your shoulders and not around your neck. This is a big deal if you, like me, tend to use the pockets a lot. It’s burly enough to wear around the wood shop.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Maestas

customer_reviews.title: beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this apron goes beyond what I expected. Durable, plenty of pockets! I especially love the clips instead of just tie strings. 100% recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Holley

customer_reviews.title: Very Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Have this apron to my husband as a gift. He laughed but wears it frequently. It washes well and looks great. Seems quite durable. Recommend as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves how it fits and looks. He says it is well made, comfortable, easy to adjust and overall high quality. He would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Miri Gyrfalcon

customer_reviews.title: Great mens apron
customer_reviews.text: Great quality on this product. I have been looking for something to use in the kitchen & outside BBQ that will stand up to the splashes. I think I may get a couple more for the men in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Romero

customer_reviews.title: Buy One, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Great apron! I got the black cloth and it was light enough to not be a burden, strong enough to handle frying 18 turkeys and 3 hams in one day. The pockets came in handy as well. Very satisfied so far!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great apron
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this barbecue apron heavy duty no problem with it in any respect very well-made I wish they all were made this good I have used it many times already and I have no problem whatsoever with this,JOHN.
customer_reviews.author: John s.

customer_reviews.title: durable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: durability redefined! this thing is definitely tougher than any pair of jeans out there, perfect for my workshop in the shed where i do all sorts of handiwork/carpentry hobbies and i keep ripping and staining my shirts... until now. what a lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my shop apron!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is adjustable so that when I am wearing a thick hoodie vs a tank top I can adjust the straps. The comfort of the padded straps reduce shoulder and back discomfort. I struggled to find an apron long enough for me because I am tall, and this one covers the front of my legs almost to my knees! It is thick, durable, keeps me clean, helps me stay organized and efficient and I love the way it fits and feels! My girlfriends from Ladies Rock Off-Road Club personalized it for me too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this apron
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron. I’m a stihl service technician. The pockets are perfect and I love the cross back it keeps the weight of the tools I have I’m my pockets from hurting my neck and giving me headaches. It’s very durable, lightweight, soft and cool. I also like the ment trend tag for my earpiece I’m required to wear it keeps the cord close to my body and it keeps it from getting caught on the equipment I work on. I can’t say enough on how I love this apron. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Angela Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Grommets came loose
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but the 2 lower grommets came loose and the material around them ripped the first time it was worn.
customer_reviews.author: mr. teapot

customer_reviews.title: A lot more useful than you think
customer_reviews.text: It really is a lot more useful than you think. It allows for multiple tools to be readily available. It keeps your clothes clean. It feels like great tough quality material. It doesn't restrict movement or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Phenomenon007

customer_reviews.title: Best apron hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love this apron, I bought the black cotton one. It fits so nice I'm 6 foot and 190 pounds. Its comfortable to wear and does bunch up or get in the way
customer_reviews.author: chadconway

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic apron.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a male floral designer and I get compliments at my shop all the time. And I have neck issues so the design is perfect to avoid any neck irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Brown

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR EVERY DAY USE!
customer_reviews.text: This apron has quality material and is well designed. The apron is also SHARP LOOKING! I REALLY wish that I could give it five stars but the stitching is horrible and is what holds the straps of the apron together and strapped to the body If you are just using this apron for light duty grilling or cooking everything will be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: The real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. This is the real deal. It is well designed and produced. It should serve it’s purpose for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron for my husband and he loves it. The material is thick and durable which is great because he wears it when he’s grilling. The design is very modern and it has a cool little clasp that will keep your headphones from dangling over your food while you cook. If you like to listen to music or podcasts while cooking, which he does. I would highly recommend this apron as gift for anyone that’s trying to stay away from the cheesy “kiss the cook” aprons.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas with his new pellet grill and he loved it! It’s very durable and kept his clothes clean. He loved all the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: BLun

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a great product. My husband does a lot of grilling and this was the perfect gift for him. This is very well made and so I'm certain that it will be around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Aurea

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a chef
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, very heavy duty, looks surprisingly cool, at least it makes you look like you know what you're doing in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a kitchen full time as a chef, so pretty much 50 hours a week in an apron. Ordered these after trying another brands. WAY more comfortable than the house bib aprons, plus the pockets for pens, tweezers, towels, etc. are so incredibly handy when plating or cooking on the line. Can't rate durability yet, I've only had them for a moth, but I'm loving the apron so much and looking forward to buy more of your products
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P

customer_reviews.title: Pixely.
customer_reviews.text: The art on the apron is very pixely, but it's still cute. I'm 4'11, and its WAYYYY huge on me, so I'll have to adjust the straps myself (they aren't adjustable)
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Strong but Pliant Material, Made for Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great apron for cooking, grilling, baking! Strong material keeps you from getting burned or clothes from getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Laukie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Construction
customer_reviews.text: Use this mostly for detailing and restoration of vehicles. Nice pockets for holding applications and tools. Nice fit and very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Art/Cooking? You need this apron!
customer_reviews.text: So well made. Clasp in back instead of tying cords is ingenious! Place for phone, towel, headphone cords so they don't get caught on something. I bought 2...I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: S. Newman

customer_reviews.title: You will look sexy in it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the apron clips easy to the back, no strings to tie, and it was short enough that it goes to my knees and I am 5 foot four. The apron deafly makes you look sexy and has plenty of pockets for your rags towels cell phone pens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he loved it. The only thing he was not a fan of was the leather circle in the back it keeps getting twisted but he said it’s not a make or break for this apron. It’s help up pretty well in the wash so far as well. I got this for an early Christmas gift. It’s 1/30/2020 so lots of trips in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but I was quite disappointed to find a few visible loose threads and tiny hole in the "side" of the apron. The fabric is good quality and my husband still likes/uses it. He said it's very comfortable, easy to adjust, and the pouches are convenient, but personally I think the quality just wasn't quite up to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanri

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, does its job
customer_reviews.text: Used it to block oil while frying, and flour while doughing. Does it's job perfectly. Thanks for the business for letting me know the stiffness is only at the beginning of the use! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eranos

customer_reviews.title: Love the apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is great! My husband thinks it’s sexy and my mother said it looks so professional. I use it at home but it is very efficient. I hate aprons that tie around the neck. I also never knew I needed that little piece that holds head phone cords. Genius. As a bread baker and daily user, it’s a slight inconvenience to take off the shoulder leather price and the plastic clips so, i handwash. It’s so much nicer than oil stains on my shirts. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Juli19

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality apron, protects the cook’s clothes and is easy to put on and take off with the easy snap belt. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Becker

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: Everything match the description... fits perfect due long adjustable straps... is long so I don’t have to be worried about my clothes.. 😌😌. I can’t wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Jesus De Castro

customer_reviews.title: An apron for every griller.
customer_reviews.text: This apron is for every griller, amature and professional alike. Pockets galore. I am able to carry tongs/spatula, a towel, a stick lighter, a basting solution, a bbq sauce, a water bottle, and my phone. The material is very strong and durable, and of coarse keeps the mess off of the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and it’s a fantastic apron. Sturdy, looks great, he loves it! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Apron!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this apron....I’m a hairstylist and this was something different than what I usually wear at work, but I loved that the straps don’t go around my neck and really like where the pockets are positioned. Really great design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the photography darkroom
customer_reviews.text: Very well make, quality construction and materials. Use this when I'm in the photography dark room. Nice to have the extra pockets.
customer_reviews.author: David Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Stylish. Plenty of pockets. I get a lot of compliments on this apron at work. Love that there's a place for your earbuds to hang from.
customer_reviews.author: Chiodoce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: I work full-time I a fast paced, from scratch kitchen. This heavy duty apron has saved my neck and upper back from the pain that comes from wearing an apron around your neck for 12 hours at a time. I've worn mine for a couple of months and it shows no real signs of wear and tear. Its aging nicely and the pockets are super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Vashon E. Bench

customer_reviews.title: Product not good
customer_reviews.text: I’m very dessapointed with the product, the same day I used it got broke, piece of leather get off waist string circle get off. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Gerber Menjivar

customer_reviews.title: Not your average cheap apron
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is incredible, the way the straps fit around my back help keep most the weight off my neck when i have things in my pockets, not only that having an area to keep a towel at all times is incredibly usefull in the kitchen and the quality of the material is phenomonal. tis is a lifetime purchase. you will never need anothe rapron.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my younger brother. He loves it and wears it regularly. He cooks often, and said that it is very comfortable. He also likes the little pocket that holds his phone on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Such a better fit
customer_reviews.text: As a resident thicc boi other aprons didn't fit well AT ALL. This bad mamajama is a dream! Now I wish that the leather holding the straps together was a higher quality but aside from that gripe I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this apron. I am a hair dresser and all the pockets this comes with makes my job sooooo much easier and it’s stylish too!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Father's for my husband cause he loves too cook and grill. It is great cause of does not show food stains/splatter cause of the dark color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable,  adjustable, and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband for Christmas because he loves cooking, and needed pockets. He uses it every day and absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Monnerat

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Sturdy, and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The straps are well designed so it fit in the shoulders as well as the neck and waist (which is what I'm used to). I feel like I forget I'm wearing it more because of that, except when the pockets come in handy! They also put a personal touch on their customer service, which I definitely appreciate. I'm glad I chose this as my "cooking time" outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, material easily rips.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear in an instrument repair shop and it's starting to wear out and rip I've only used it for about a month. The straps are very long so if you're on the thin side like me you're going to need to trim them so they don't get caught on any thing.
customer_reviews.author: Detrocious

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good design
customer_reviews.text: The tying mechanism is by far the best I have seen in any apron. As it's made of denim I am not scared of staining it. It has a lot of pockets for you to keep your phone or other stuff while you are cooking or working, I especially like the towel hanger on the side. The fit is a bit stiff at the beginning but with use it fits you perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gauravi Saha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love the aprons. They are lightweight and great quality. We work in a shop and need something to keep us from getting our clothes so dirty and this helps in just that way. Love the pockets as well :)
customer_reviews.author: christie v

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it it was a Fathers day gift wish i could put a picture on here for you.. we had it screen printed Steg’s BadAss BBQ
customer_reviews.author: Cindy stegmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great apron for artists!
customer_reviews.text: This apron is the best fitting one I have ever had. The straps cross in the back, which keeps the weight off the apron off the back of my neck. They stay put, no sliding off the shoulders. The straps that cross in the back then wrap around the waist to buckle securely in front. And I love the pockets! Clever design.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very stylish. I love all the pockets. Nice material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at my work loves this even the owner of the restaurant. It’s so comfortable. I’ll want to order more. I love that there’s no restricting neck strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’m pretty excited to have this apron and it’s exactly what you think you are getting. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: There is a wax coating on the apron glue peels right off of it..
customer_reviews.text: I work with glue all day long and this is the best protection
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramage

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This apron was a gift for my other half for his birthday and he LOVES it. He loves the fact it has magnetic pockets since he’ll be using it in the garage for welding projects and cutting metal. The material is very durable and great quality. And we love the fact that it’s handmade by a small Family owned business.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: All the positive reviews are right; I bought this apron (the black one) as a gift for my boyfriend. He looks great in it, he loves it and it looks professional. Great quality, look and utility for a fair price :) .
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and his boss loved it so much they want to buy these for the whole cafe/bar staff! The material is thick, so he can’t wear it in the kitchen during the hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this apron. Full coverage, great quality of workmans ship and tons of pockets. Plus very stylish for working in an environment where clients will see you. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M Paulding

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this apron as a birthday gift for my fiancé, as we always like to cook together and try out new recipes. I can’t wait to give it to him! When I got the package in, I was so excited to open it and was pleased with what I found. Great quality, durable material, and a gift he is sure to love!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Turgeon

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: i love the apron just the way it is i won`t change nothing thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marcial Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for those who need extra pockets. I work with a lot of small screws in electronics and use it all the time perfect for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Salenti

product_meta.title: ARAWAK BRAVE Professional Cooking Apron Chef Designed for Kitchen BBQ Grill / 10 OZ Black Cotton for Women and Men Bib Adjustable/Towel Loop + Quick Release Buckle + Tool Pockets + Headphones Loop
feature_bullets: UNIQUE HEADPHONES LOOP – Do you like listening to music, to your favorite audio book or do you just like talking on your mobile? This kitchen apron offers a one of a kind feature; equipped with a unique headphones loop. Combine your passion for cooking (or make cooking more tolerable) along with your love for music and books. This special loop prevents your headphones from getting in the way of your cooking by preventing any possible interference and makes it so much more FUN to cook.

PROFESSIONAL GRADE QUALITY – Looking for the best cooking apron? You found it. No more neck pains with our cross back straps. Built with solid brass rivets and grommets. Double stitched pockets for high functionality and durability. Machine washable. Highly stylish with a high end look that will make you feel like one of the pros.

HIGH FUNCTIONALITY – Built to cater to your everyday cooking needs; the apron has two large pockets in the front bottom with “Kangaroo” style hand pockets just above. A strategically placed towel loop is available on the right hip side. Chest pocket big enough to hold your Cell phone. The perfect commercial kitchen apron for men and women.

UNISEX & ADJUSTABLE UP TO MEN’S XXL – The extra long straps along with our buckle for quick release allows for a wide range of sizing. The apron measures at 27 inches wide x 34 inches tall, covering size adjustments of up to Men’s XXL. Will accommodate up to a 50 inch waist, recommended height is 5' 2" or taller. The perfect fit for both female and male cook, chef or sous chef.

DURABILITY FIRST – Built to withstand the toughest kitchens and cooking endeavors. Hand made from 10 oz cotton, which is soft and breathable and yet strong and flexible. Inspired by real chefs and cooking professionals to make for the ideal kitchen apron. Wide use: Gardening, grill, barbecue, bbq, kitchen, cook, chef, professional, server, grilling, restaurant, bakers, barista, bartender, custom, butcher, artist, barber, men's, oversized, grill master, birthday gift, adult, garden, heavy duty.
